descriptionHtml:
This is a RaceMenu Preset of my grumpy Breton, called Vasaaq.
Maybe someone out there likes this kind of chocolate.

[b]Mods I use for him:[/b]

Body: [url=https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/498-sos-schlongs-of-skyrim/]SoS [/url]﻿ with [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145]Smooth Body Textures for Better Males and SoS[/url]﻿
Face: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures for Men[/url]﻿

Hair: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdo's - Renewal[/url]﻿ -> for the bright haircolor I added this mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88254]Smooth Silky Straight KS Hairdo's Retexture[/url]﻿
Brows: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411]Brows[/url]﻿
Eyes: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]﻿[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722][font=Roboto, sans-serif][color=#ffffff] [/color][/font][/url]
Scar: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4784]High Resolution Scars[/url]﻿


[b]Armors I used for the screenshots: [/b](pics from left to right)

Archmage Armor Parts from The Well Dressed Mage (Earrindo) + Armor Parts from SAM Dragonbone Set (VectorPlexus)
Casual Clothes from Apachii Divine Elegance Store (apachii and urshi)
Maria Hunter Armor from the Bloodborne Pack by Team Tal

Follower version is now available (separate mod).


Hope you like him! :)
author: Thrwomp
